snippet.title: Minion Masters Teaser
snippet.description:
Visit http://betadwarf.com/community to get ACCESS and to get FREE DLCs for all BetaDwarf games.

Learn more about Minion Masters at http://minionmastersthegame.com or go straight to the steam page http://store.steampowered.com/app/489520/

ABOUT THIS GAME:
Collect an army of Minions and go head to head with other online players in a real-time dual lane minion clash. Choose one of the Minion Masters each with their own unique powers. Send mighty Minions and cast sparkling Spells to overwhelm the other Minion Master and ultimately win the duel.

FEATURES:
- Duel players from around the world in real-time 
- Earn gold to unlock rewards, collect new powerful Minions and even   new Masters 
- Each Minion Master is a unique experience with different strategic advantages 
- Gain rating points as you defeat your opponents and see how you Rank 
- Be creative and construct the ultimate Minion Army 
- Unlock multiple Arenas and choose those that fit your Minion Army 
- Challenge your friends to a private duel 
- Learn different battle tactics by studying replays
